title: UPDATE 2-Canada stock markets shut down due to exchange issues -TMX
text:
April 27, 2018 / 7:12 PM / in 42 minutes UPDATE 2-Canada stock markets shut down due to exchange issues -TMX Reuters Staff 2 Min Read
(Adds details on U.S. listed shares, market comment)
TORONTO, April 27 (Reuters) - The TMX Group, said on Friday it was shutting down all markets for the rest of the day after experiencing issues with trading on all its exchange platforms.
 New York Stock Exchange-listed shares, for example, were trading as of 3:08 p.m. EDT, but the company’s TSX-listed shares had not traded since 1:38 p.m.
 EDT (1800 GMT),
“I don’t think it was (Reporting by Julie Gordon and Fergal Smith in Toronto Editing by Tom Brown)
